d:
It is winter in New York City, during the Christmas season. Snow falls softly as Madonna, a timeless icon, dominates the Madison Square Garden with a sensational performance.
But while the city celebrates, something dark is unfolding.

News reports speak of a deranged Superman, infected by a corrupted form of kryptonite that has altered his mind and instincts. When the Man of Steel reaches New York, the line between legend, desire, and danger completely vanishes.

What follows is an adult erotic parody, intense and provocative, where two pop-culture legends collide in a surreal and intimate confrontation filled with power, temptation, and forbidden fantasy.

This story is a bold and irreverent homage to classic superhero comics and to a legendary music icon, reimagined through a fictional, parodistic, and erotic lens.

Created by Marcus Daice
n: [Western] SUPERMAN vs MADONNA  - A Battle Beneath the Sheets Between the Man of Steel and the Queen of Pop (by Marcus Daice)
